text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: An extension to specify the method by which the patient record holder obtains the information.

purpose.value: This extension represents the AcquisitionMethod concept of the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) RegistrationData v1.1.1 (2024)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/RegistrationData-v1.1.1(2024EN)).

copyright.value: Copyright and related rights waived via CC0, https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/. This does not apply to information from third parties, for example a medical terminology system. The implementer alone is responsible for identifying and obtaining any necessary licenses or authorizations to utilize third party IP in connection with the specification or otherwise.

definition.value: The way in which the information is obtained by the patient record holder.
